t: Amazon.com: Bendix PDR0570 Brake Drum : Automotive
s: These are junk. I bought 2 of them and they were warped. I took them to a local shop to see if they could turn them and the shop could not. They said that the drums are so out of round that if they cut (turn) them that so much material would have to be removed that they would become out of spec.
